title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & John Ziegler | 11/12/21
description:
Pat Gray joins to discuss the social media throttling of free speech and the World Economic Forum announcing the Great Narrative. Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, discussing the Kyle Rittenhouse trial, past presidents and executive privilege, and BLM threatening New York with violence. John Ziegler, senior columnist for Mediaite, joins to discuss what he learned about the modern media after investigating the Penn State scandal for 10 years.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
